answers.answer: Good news is they caught it and know about it :) they can help you take measures to relax and if labor begins early theres a few ways they can slow it and even stall it long enough to get you full term :) everything should be fine and ill keep you in my thoughts
I had genetic high blood pressure before I got pregnant and it went away during the first two trimesters I'm probably just stressing myself out more
Thanks also for keeping me in you thoughts
I'm so sorry hun. My prayers are with you and your baby.

question: Well I got my lab results back today and the doctor said I have preeclampsia. :/ I don't even know what to do. My mom had it and so did my gma. I'm truthfully nervous. I'm 31+5. My mother had my brother her first at 32 weeks and me at 36 weeks I'm so nervous.
title: lab results back
